text: Hollywood star Eddie Murphy is ‘ not interested ’ in seeing his 10 - year - old daughter Angel, the child he has with America ’ s Got Talent star Mel B, a Los Angeles court was told Wednesday. The Spice Girl ’ s ex - husband Stephen Belafonte - who helped raise Angel during his 10 - year marriage to Mel - is trying to persuade a judge to grant him step - parent visitation with the child, whom, he says, ‘ has called me dad since she started to talk. ’ Mel, 42 - who showed up at LA Superior Court today wearing a green silk shirt, flowered pants, yellow spike heels and a new frizzy hairdo - is vehemently opposing his efforts, refusing to let him see her daughter.
